mapper.select: SELECT user_email, user_password FROM user WHERE user_email = #{user_email} AND user_password = #{user_password};
SELECT enterprise_email, enterprise_password FROM enterprise WHERE enterprise_email = #{enterprise_email} AND enterprise_password = #{enterprise_password};
mapper.update: update user set user_password = #{user_password} where user_email = #{user_email}
update enterprise set enterprise_password = #{enterprise_password} where enterprise_email = #{enterprise_email}
